title: Knowledge IQ exam prep landing page (dark navy + saffron)

requirements.summary: Create a responsive, modern Knowledge IQ landing page with dark navy + saffron branding, consistent typography, and exam-focused content (UPSC/SSC/RRB/WBCS/PSC).
acceptanceCriteria: The homepage prominently displays the site name "Knowledge IQ" and references the target exams (UPSC, SSC, RRB, WBCS, PSC).
Primary colors are dark navy blue and saffron and are applied consistently to backgrounds, accents, buttons, and highlights.
Layout is responsive and usable on mobile, tablet, and desktop without horizontal scrolling.

file_operations.description: Implement the single-page landing layout and content structure for Knowledge IQ, including header + main content flow and responsive section spacing. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button/Card) for consistent UI composition; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Define global theme tokens and base typography/spacing using Tailwind-friendly CSS variables, setting dark navy as the primary background and saffron as the primary accent; ensure consistent heading/body styles across sections.

Adjust Tailwind theme configuration (if needed) to better support the dark navy + saffron palette and consistent typography defaults used by the landing page (keeping existing shadcn variable-based color approach intact).

requirements.summary: Implement a hero section with the required India map + exam icons visual, English headline/subheadline, and exact CTA buttons.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section renders an India map outline plus the four specified icons as part of the hero visual (not only as text).
Two CTA buttons are visible in the hero with labels exactly: "Start Practice" and "Download Free PDFs".
CTAs are keyboard focusable and have visible hover/focus styles.

file_operations.description: Add the hero section UI: headline/subheadline copy, an -based hero visual using the generated artwork, and two CTA buttons labeled exactly "Start Practice" and "Download Free PDFs" with clear hover/focus styles. Use shadcn-ui Button component for CTAs; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add the generated hero illustration asset (India map outline + book/target/globe/chart) as a static file so the frontend can reference it directly without any backend calls.
Add the generated standalone icons set as a static file under generated assets for optional use in hero/sections without any backend calls.

requirements.summary: Add five distinct homepage sections (Daily GK, Mock Tests, Current Affairs, Previous Year Questions, Free PDFs) with descriptions and clear actions.
acceptanceCriteria: All five sections appear on the homepage with headings exactly matching the requested labels.
Each section includes at least one short English description line and a clickable action element (button or link).
Sections are visually separated with consistent spacing and follow the site theme.

file_operations.description: Add five clearly labeled sections with headings exactly: Daily GK, Mock Tests, Current Affairs, Previous Year Questions, Free PDFs. Each section should include a short English description and an obvious action (button/link) to explore. Use shadcn-ui Card and Button (or equivalent) for consistent layout; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement basic on-page SEO and accessibility: title/meta description, single H1, semantic landmarks, and proper alt text handling.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage has a single H1 and uses semantic sections (header/main/section/footer).
Document title includes "Knowledge IQ" and references competitive exam preparation.
A meta description is present and written in English.
All meaningful images used in content/hero have non-empty alt text; decorative images/icons are marked appropriately (e.g., empty alt or aria-hidden).

file_operations.description: Set an SEO-friendly document <title> including "Knowledge IQ" and competitive exam preparation, and add an English meta description tag.

Ensure the page uses semantic landmarks (header/main/section/footer) and contains exactly one H1. Provide non-empty alt text for meaningful hero/section images; mark purely decorative visuals appropriately (e.g., aria-hidden or empty alt).

requirements.summary: Use the generated hero artwork as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with no backend fetching.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
No backend calls are required to render the hero artwork.

file_operations.description: Reference the static hero image at frontend/public/assets/generated/knowledge-iq-hero.dim_1600x900.png (and optionally the icons set at frontend/public/assets/generated/knowledge-iq-icons-set.dim_512x512.png) directly from the hero UI; do not add any backend-dependent image loading.
